text: Marsha Mason (born April 3, 1942) is an American actress and a television director. She has gotten four Academy Award nominations. She played Janice Templeton in the 1977 movie Audrey Rose. She played Polly Cronin in 1991 in Drop Dead Fred. Mason was born in St. Louis, Missouri. title: Marsha Mason
